mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "From the Floor", "Square Dance Date Book", "On the Record and Record Report", "As I See It, by Bob Osgood", "The 12th National Square Dance Convention", "The Dancer's Walkthru", "Vox Saltator: The Square Dancer Speaks Up", "Style Series: Grand Square Variation The Grand Stroll", "'Round the Outside Ring", "Workshop", "The Caller of the Month: Wally Schultz", "Homes for Square Dancing: Quonset Hut in Hawaii", "Paging the Roundancers: Lloyd and Marge Platt", and "Experimental Lab: Shoot the Moon".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
